25constexpr size_t kDynamicIndexDataSize = 1024 * 8;
26
27angle::Result StreamVertexData(ContextMtl *contextMtl,
28 mtl::BufferPool *dynamicBuffer,
29 const uint8_t *sourceData,
30 size_t bytesToAllocate,
31 size_t destOffset,
32 size_t vertexCount,
33 size_t stride,
34 VertexCopyFunction vertexLoadFunction,
35 SimpleWeakBufferHolderMtl *bufferHolder,
36 size_t *bufferOffsetOut)
37{
38 ANGLE_CHECK(contextMtl, vertexLoadFunction, "Unsupported format conversion", GL_INVALID_ENUM);
39 uint8_t *dst = nullptr;
40 mtl::BufferRef newBuffer;
41 ANGLE_TRY(dynamicBuffer->allocate(contextMtl, bytesToAllocate, &dst, &newBuffer,
42 bufferOffsetOut, nullptr));
43 bufferHolder->set(newBuffer);
44 dst += destOffset;
45 vertexLoadFunction(sourceData, stride, vertexCount, dst);
46
47 ANGLE_TRY(dynamicBuffer->commit(contextMtl));
48 return angle::Result::Continue;
49}
50
51template <typename SizeT>
52const mtl::VertexFormat &GetVertexConversionFormat(ContextMtl *contextMtl,
53 angle::FormatID originalFormat,
54 SizeT *strideOut)
55{
56 // Convert to tightly packed format
57 const mtl::VertexFormat &packedFormat = contextMtl->getVertexFormat(originalFormat, true);
58 *strideOut = packedFormat.actualAngleFormat().pixelBytes;
59 return packedFormat;
60}
61
62size_t GetIndexConvertedBufferSize(gl::DrawElementsType indexType, size_t indexCount)
63{
64 size_t elementSize = gl::GetDrawElementsTypeSize(indexType);
65 if (indexType == gl::DrawElementsType::UnsignedByte)
66 {
67 // 8-bit indices are not supported by Metal, so they are promoted to
68 // 16-bit indices below
69 elementSize = sizeof(GLushort);
70 }
71
72 const size_t amount = elementSize * indexCount;
73
74 return amount;
75}
76
77angle::Result StreamIndexData(ContextMtl *contextMtl,
78 mtl::BufferPool *dynamicBuffer,
79 const uint8_t *sourcePointer,
80 gl::DrawElementsType indexType,
81 size_t indexCount,
82 bool primitiveRestartEnabled,
83 mtl::BufferRef *bufferOut,
84 size_t *bufferOffsetOut)
85{
86 dynamicBuffer->releaseInFlightBuffers(contextMtl);
87 const size_t amount = GetIndexConvertedBufferSize(indexType, indexCount);
88 GLubyte *dst = nullptr;
89 ANGLE_TRY(
90 dynamicBuffer->allocate(contextMtl, amount, &dst, bufferOut, bufferOffsetOut, nullptr));
91
92 if (indexType == gl::DrawElementsType::UnsignedByte)
93 {
94 // Unsigned bytes don't have direct support in Metal so we have to expand the
95 // memory to a GLushort.
96 const GLubyte *in = static_cast<const GLubyte *>(sourcePointer);
97 GLushort *expandedDst = reinterpret_cast<GLushort *>(dst);
98
99 if (primitiveRestartEnabled)
100 {
101 for (size_t index = 0; index < indexCount; index++)
102 {
103 if (in[index] == 0xFF)
104 {
105 expandedDst[index] = 0xFFFF;
106 }
107 else
108 {
109 expandedDst[index] = static_cast<GLushort>(in[index]);
110 }
111 }
112 } // if (primitiveRestartEnabled)
113 else
114 {
115 for (size_t index = 0; index < indexCount; index++)
116 {
117 expandedDst[index] = static_cast<GLushort>(in[index]);
118 }
119 } // if (primitiveRestartEnabled)
120 }
121 else
122 {
123 memcpy(dst, sourcePointer, amount);
124 }
125 ANGLE_TRY(dynamicBuffer->commit(contextMtl));
126
127 return angle::Result::Continue;
128}
129
130size_t GetVertexCount(BufferMtl *srcBuffer,
131 const gl::VertexBinding &binding,
132 uint32_t srcFormatSize)
133{
134 // Bytes usable for vertex data.
135 GLint64 bytes = srcBuffer->size() - binding.getOffset();
136 if (bytes < srcFormatSize)
137 return 0;
138
139 // Count the last vertex. It may occupy less than a full stride.
140 size_t numVertices = 1;
141 bytes -= srcFormatSize;
142
143 // Count how many strides fit remaining space.
144 if (bytes > 0)
145 numVertices += static_cast<size_t>(bytes) / binding.getStride();
146
147 return numVertices;
148}
149
150inline size_t GetIndexCount(BufferMtl *srcBuffer, size_t offset, gl::DrawElementsType indexType)
151{
152 size_t elementSize = gl::GetDrawElementsTypeSize(indexType);
153 return (srcBuffer->size() - offset) / elementSize;
154}
155
156inline void SetDefaultVertexBufferLayout(mtl::VertexBufferLayoutDesc *layout)
157{
158 layout->stepFunction = mtl::kVertexStepFunctionInvalid;
159 layout->stepRate = 0;
160 layout->stride = 0;
161}
162
163} // namespace
164
165// VertexArrayMtl implementation
166VertexArrayMtl::VertexArrayMtl(const gl::VertexArrayState &state, ContextMtl *context)
167 : VertexArrayImpl(state),
168 mDefaultFloatVertexFormat(
169 context->getVertexFormat(angle::FormatID::R32G32B32A32_FLOAT, false)),
170 mDefaultIntVertexFormat(context->getVertexFormat(angle::FormatID::R32G32B32A32_SINT, false)),
171 mDefaultUIntVertexFormat(context->getVertexFormat(angle::FormatID::R32G32B32A32_UINT, false))
172{
173 reset(context);
174
175 mDynamicVertexData.initialize(context, 0, mtl::kVertexAttribBufferStrideAlignment,
176 /** maxBuffers */ 10 * mtl::kMaxVertexAttribs);
177
178 mDynamicIndexData.initialize(context, kDynamicIndexDataSize, mtl::kIndexBufferOffsetAlignment,
179 0);
180}
181VertexArrayMtl::~VertexArrayMtl() {}
182
183void VertexArrayMtl::destroy(const gl::Context *context)
184{
185 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
186
187 reset(contextMtl);
188
189 mDynamicVertexData.destroy(contextMtl);
190 mDynamicIndexData.destroy(contextMtl);
191}
192
193void VertexArrayMtl::reset(ContextMtl *context)
194{
195 for (BufferHolderMtl *&buffer : mCurrentArrayBuffers)
196 {
197 buffer = nullptr;
198 }
199 for (size_t &offset : mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets)
200 {
201 offset = 0;
202 }
203 for (GLuint &stride : mCurrentArrayBufferStrides)
204 {
205 stride = 0;
206 }
207 for (const mtl::VertexFormat *&format : mCurrentArrayBufferFormats)
208 {
209 format = &mDefaultFloatVertexFormat;
210 }
211
212 for (size_t &inlineDataSize : mCurrentArrayInlineDataSizes)
213 {
214 inlineDataSize = 0;
215 }
216
217 for (angle::MemoryBuffer &convertedClientArray : mConvertedClientSmallArrays)
218 {
219 convertedClientArray.clear();
220 }
221
222 for (const uint8_t *&clientPointer : mCurrentArrayInlineDataPointers)
223 {
224 clientPointer = nullptr;
225 }
226
227 if (context->getDisplay()->getFeatures().allowInlineConstVertexData.enabled)
228 {
229 mInlineDataMaxSize = mtl::kInlineConstDataMaxSize;
230 }
231 else
232 {
233 mInlineDataMaxSize = 0;
234 }
235
236 mVertexArrayDirty = true;
237}
238
239angle::Result VertexArrayMtl::syncState(const gl::Context *context,
240 const gl::VertexArray::DirtyBits &dirtyBits,
241 gl::VertexArray::DirtyAttribBitsArray *attribBits,
242 gl::VertexArray::DirtyBindingBitsArray *bindingBits)
243{
244 const std::vector<gl::VertexAttribute> &attribs = mState.getVertexAttributes();
245 const std::vector<gl::VertexBinding> &bindings = mState.getVertexBindings();
246
247 for (size_t dirtyBit : dirtyBits)
248 {
249 switch (dirtyBit)
250 {
251 case gl::VertexArray::DIRTY_BIT_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER:
252 case gl::VertexArray::DIRTY_BIT_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_DATA:
253 {
254 break;
255 }
256
257#define ANGLE_VERTEX_DIRTY_ATTRIB_FUNC(INDEX) \
258 case gl::VertexArray::DIRTY_BIT_ATTRIB_0 + INDEX: \
259 ANGLE_TRY(syncDirtyAttrib(context, attribs[INDEX], bindings[attribs[INDEX].bindingIndex], \
260 INDEX)); \
261 mVertexArrayDirty = true; \
262 (*attribBits)[INDEX].reset(); \
263 break;
264
265 ANGLE_VERTEX_INDEX_CASES(ANGLE_VERTEX_DIRTY_ATTRIB_FUNC)
266
267#define ANGLE_VERTEX_DIRTY_BINDING_FUNC(INDEX) \
268 case gl::VertexArray::DIRTY_BIT_BINDING_0 + INDEX: \
269 ANGLE_TRY(syncDirtyAttrib(context, attribs[INDEX], bindings[attribs[INDEX].bindingIndex], \
270 INDEX)); \
271 mVertexArrayDirty = true; \
272 (*bindingBits)[INDEX].reset(); \
273 break;
274
275 ANGLE_VERTEX_INDEX_CASES(ANGLE_VERTEX_DIRTY_BINDING_FUNC)
276
277#define ANGLE_VERTEX_DIRTY_BUFFER_DATA_FUNC(INDEX) \
278 case gl::VertexArray::DIRTY_BIT_BUFFER_DATA_0 + INDEX: \
279 ANGLE_TRY(syncDirtyAttrib(context, attribs[INDEX], bindings[attribs[INDEX].bindingIndex], \
280 INDEX)); \
281 mVertexArrayDirty = true; \
282 break;
283
284 ANGLE_VERTEX_INDEX_CASES(ANGLE_VERTEX_DIRTY_BUFFER_DATA_FUNC)
285
286 default:
287 UNREACHABLE();
288 break;
289 }
290 }
291
292 return angle::Result::Continue;
293}
294
295ANGLE_INLINE void VertexArrayMtl::getVertexAttribFormatAndArraySize(const sh::ShaderVariable &var,
296 MTLVertexFormat *formatOut,
297 uint32_t *arraySizeOut)
298{
299 uint32_t arraySize = var.getArraySizeProduct();
300
301 MTLVertexFormat format;
302 switch (var.type)
303 {
304 case GL_INT:
305 case GL_INT_VEC2:
306 case GL_INT_VEC3:
307 case GL_INT_VEC4:
308 format = mDefaultIntVertexFormat.metalFormat;
309 break;
310 case GL_UNSIGNED_INT:
311 case GL_UNSIGNED_INT_VEC2:
312 case GL_UNSIGNED_INT_VEC3:
313 case GL_UNSIGNED_INT_VEC4:
314 format = mDefaultUIntVertexFormat.metalFormat;
315 break;
316 case GL_FLOAT_MAT2:
317 case GL_FLOAT_MAT2x3:
318 case GL_FLOAT_MAT2x4:
319 arraySize *= 2;
320 format = mDefaultFloatVertexFormat.metalFormat;
321 break;
322 case GL_FLOAT_MAT3:
323 case GL_FLOAT_MAT3x2:
324 case GL_FLOAT_MAT3x4:
325 arraySize *= 3;
326 format = mDefaultFloatVertexFormat.metalFormat;
327 break;
328 case GL_FLOAT_MAT4:
329 case GL_FLOAT_MAT4x2:
330 case GL_FLOAT_MAT4x3:
331 arraySize *= 4;
332 format = mDefaultFloatVertexFormat.metalFormat;
333 break;
334 default:
335 format = mDefaultFloatVertexFormat.metalFormat;
336 }
337
338 *arraySizeOut = arraySize;
339 *formatOut = format;
340}
341
342// vertexDescChanged is both input and output, the input value if is true, will force new
343// mtl::VertexDesc to be returned via vertexDescOut. This typically happens when active shader
344// program is changed.
345// Otherwise, it is only returned when the vertex array is dirty.
346angle::Result VertexArrayMtl::setupDraw(const gl::Context *glContext,
347 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *cmdEncoder,
348 bool *vertexDescChanged,
349 mtl::VertexDesc *vertexDescOut)
350{
351 // NOTE(hqle): consider only updating dirty attributes
352 bool dirty = mVertexArrayDirty || *vertexDescChanged;
353
354 if (dirty)
355 {
356 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
357
358 mVertexArrayDirty = false;
359 mEmulatedInstanceAttribs.clear();
360
361 const gl::ProgramExecutable *executable = glContext->getState().getProgramExecutable();
362 const gl::AttributesMask &programActiveAttribsMask =
363 executable->getActiveAttribLocationsMask();
364 const gl::ProgramState &programState = glContext->getState().getProgram()->getState();
365
366 const std::vector<gl::VertexAttribute> &attribs = mState.getVertexAttributes();
367 const std::vector<gl::VertexBinding> &bindings = mState.getVertexBindings();
368
369 mtl::VertexDesc &desc = *vertexDescOut;
370
371 desc.numAttribs = mtl::kMaxVertexAttribs;
372 desc.numBufferLayouts = mtl::kMaxVertexAttribs;
373
374 // Initialize the buffer layouts with constant step rate
375 for (uint32_t b = 0; b < mtl::kMaxVertexAttribs; ++b)
376 {
377 SetDefaultVertexBufferLayout(&desc.layouts[b]);
378 }
379
380 for (uint32_t v = 0; v < mtl::kMaxVertexAttribs; ++v)
381 {
382 if (!programActiveAttribsMask.test(v))
383 {
384 desc.attributes[v].format = MTLVertexFormatInvalid;
385 desc.attributes[v].bufferIndex = 0;
386 desc.attributes[v].offset = 0;
387 continue;
388 }
389
390 const auto &attrib = attribs[v];
391 const gl::VertexBinding &binding = bindings[attrib.bindingIndex];
392
393 bool attribEnabled = attrib.enabled;
394 if (attribEnabled && !mCurrentArrayBuffers[v] && !mCurrentArrayInlineDataPointers[v])
395 {
396 // Disable it to avoid crash.
397 attribEnabled = false;
398 }
399
400 if (!attribEnabled)
401 {
402 desc.attributes[v].bufferIndex = mtl::kDefaultAttribsBindingIndex;
403 desc.attributes[v].offset = v * mtl::kDefaultAttributeSize;
404 // Need to find the attribute having the exact binding location = v in the program
405 // inputs list to retrieve its coresponding data type:
406 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &programInputs =
407 programState.getProgramInputs();
408 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable>::const_iterator attribInfoIte = std::find_if(
409 begin(programInputs), end(programInputs), [v](const sh::ShaderVariable &sv) {
410 return static_cast<uint32_t>(sv.location) <= v &&
411 v < static_cast<uint32_t>(sv.location) +
412 gl::VariableAttributeCount(sv.type);
413 });
414
415 ASSERT(attribInfoIte != end(programInputs));
416 switch (gl::VariableComponentType(attribInfoIte->type))
417 {
418 case GL_INT:
419 desc.attributes[v].format = mDefaultIntVertexFormat.metalFormat;
420 break;
421 case GL_UNSIGNED_INT:
422 desc.attributes[v].format = mDefaultUIntVertexFormat.metalFormat;
423 break;
424 default:
425 desc.attributes[v].format = mDefaultFloatVertexFormat.metalFormat;
426 }
427 }
428 else
429 {
430 uint32_t bufferIdx = mtl::kVboBindingIndexStart + v;
431 uint32_t bufferOffset = static_cast<uint32_t>(mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets[v]);
432
433 const angle::Format &angleFormat =
434 mCurrentArrayBufferFormats[v]->actualAngleFormat();
435 desc.attributes[v].format = mCurrentArrayBufferFormats[v]->metalFormat;
436
437 desc.attributes[v].bufferIndex = bufferIdx;
438 desc.attributes[v].offset = 0;
439 ASSERT((bufferOffset % angleFormat.pixelBytes) == 0);
440
441 ASSERT(bufferIdx < mtl::kMaxVertexAttribs);
442 if (binding.getDivisor() == 0)
443 {
444 desc.layouts[bufferIdx].stepFunction = MTLVertexStepFunctionPerVertex;
445 desc.layouts[bufferIdx].stepRate = 1;
446 }
447 else if (contextMtl->getDisplay()->getFeatures().hasBaseVertexInstancedDraw.enabled)
448 {
449 desc.layouts[bufferIdx].stepFunction = MTLVertexStepFunctionPerInstance;
450 desc.layouts[bufferIdx].stepRate = binding.getDivisor();
451 }
452 else
453 {
454 // Emulate instance attribute
455 mEmulatedInstanceAttribs.push_back(v);
456 desc.layouts[bufferIdx].stepFunction = MTLVertexStepFunctionConstant;
457 desc.layouts[bufferIdx].stepRate = 0;
458 }
459
460 desc.layouts[bufferIdx].stride = mCurrentArrayBufferStrides[v];
461
462 if (mCurrentArrayBuffers[v])
463 {
464 cmdEncoder->setVertexBuffer(mCurrentArrayBuffers[v]->getCurrentBuffer(),
465 bufferOffset, bufferIdx);
466 }
467 else
468 {
469 // No buffer specified, use the client memory directly as inline constant data
470 ASSERT(mCurrentArrayInlineDataSizes[v] <= mInlineDataMaxSize);
471 cmdEncoder->setVertexBytes(mCurrentArrayInlineDataPointers[v],
472 mCurrentArrayInlineDataSizes[v], bufferIdx);
473 }
474 }
475 } // for (v)
476 }
477
478 *vertexDescChanged = dirty;
479
480 return angle::Result::Continue;
481}
482
483void VertexArrayMtl::emulateInstanceDrawStep(mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *cmdEncoder,
484 uint32_t instanceId)
485{
486
487 const std::vector<gl::VertexAttribute> &attribs = mState.getVertexAttributes();
488 const std::vector<gl::VertexBinding> &bindings = mState.getVertexBindings();
489
490 for (uint32_t instanceAttribIdx : mEmulatedInstanceAttribs)
491 {
492 uint32_t bufferIdx = mtl::kVboBindingIndexStart + instanceAttribIdx;
493 const auto &attrib = attribs[instanceAttribIdx];
494 const gl::VertexBinding &binding = bindings[attrib.bindingIndex];
495 uint32_t offset =
496 instanceId / binding.getDivisor() * mCurrentArrayBufferStrides[instanceAttribIdx];
497 if (mCurrentArrayBuffers[instanceAttribIdx])
498 {
499 offset += static_cast<uint32_t>(mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets[instanceAttribIdx]);
500
501 cmdEncoder->setVertexBuffer(mCurrentArrayBuffers[instanceAttribIdx]->getCurrentBuffer(),
502 offset, bufferIdx);
503 }
504 else
505 {
506 // No buffer specified, use the client memory directly as inline constant data
507 ASSERT(mCurrentArrayInlineDataSizes[instanceAttribIdx] <= mInlineDataMaxSize);
508 if (offset > mCurrentArrayInlineDataSizes[instanceAttribIdx])
509 {
510 offset = static_cast<uint32_t>(mCurrentArrayInlineDataSizes[instanceAttribIdx]);
511 }
512 cmdEncoder->setVertexBytes(mCurrentArrayInlineDataPointers[instanceAttribIdx] + offset,
513 mCurrentArrayInlineDataSizes[instanceAttribIdx] - offset,
514 bufferIdx);
515 }
516 }
517}
518
519angle::Result VertexArrayMtl::updateClientAttribs(const gl::Context *context,
520 GLint firstVertex,
521 GLsizei vertexOrIndexCount,
522 GLsizei instanceCount,
523 gl::DrawElementsType indexTypeOrInvalid,
524 const void *indices)
525{
526 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
527 const gl::AttributesMask &clientAttribs = context->getStateCache().getActiveClientAttribsMask();
528
529 ASSERT(clientAttribs.any());
530
531 GLint startVertex;
532 size_t vertexCount;
533 ANGLE_TRY(GetVertexRangeInfo(context, firstVertex, vertexOrIndexCount, indexTypeOrInvalid,
534 indices, 0, &startVertex, &vertexCount));
535
536 mDynamicVertexData.releaseInFlightBuffers(contextMtl);
537
538 const std::vector<gl::VertexAttribute> &attribs = mState.getVertexAttributes();
539 const std::vector<gl::VertexBinding> &bindings = mState.getVertexBindings();
540
541 for (size_t attribIndex : clientAttribs)
542 {
543 const gl::VertexAttribute &attrib = attribs[attribIndex];
544 const gl::VertexBinding &binding = bindings[attrib.bindingIndex];
545 ASSERT(attrib.enabled && binding.getBuffer().get() == nullptr);
546
547 // Source client memory pointer
548 const uint8_t *src = static_cast<const uint8_t *>(attrib.pointer);
549 ASSERT(src);
550
551 GLint startElement;
552 size_t elementCount;
553 if (binding.getDivisor() == 0)
554 {
555 // Per vertex attribute
556 startElement = startVertex;
557 elementCount = vertexCount;
558 }
559 else
560 {
561 // Per instance attribute
562 startElement = 0;
563 elementCount = UnsignedCeilDivide(instanceCount, binding.getDivisor());
564 }
565 size_t bytesIntendedToUse = (startElement + elementCount) * binding.getStride();
566
567 const mtl::VertexFormat &format = contextMtl->getVertexFormat(attrib.format->id, false);
568 bool needStreaming = format.actualFormatId != format.intendedFormatId ||
569 (binding.getStride() % mtl::kVertexAttribBufferStrideAlignment) != 0 ||
570 (binding.getStride() < format.actualAngleFormat().pixelBytes) ||
571 bytesIntendedToUse > mInlineDataMaxSize;
572
573 if (!needStreaming)
574 {
575 // Data will be uploaded directly as inline constant data
576 mCurrentArrayBuffers[attribIndex] = nullptr;
577 mCurrentArrayInlineDataPointers[attribIndex] = src;
578 mCurrentArrayInlineDataSizes[attribIndex] = bytesIntendedToUse;
579 mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets[attribIndex] = 0;
580 mCurrentArrayBufferFormats[attribIndex] = &format;
581 mCurrentArrayBufferStrides[attribIndex] = binding.getStride();
582 }
583 else
584 {
585 GLuint convertedStride;
586 // Need to stream the client vertex data to a buffer.
587 const mtl::VertexFormat &streamFormat =
588 GetVertexConversionFormat(contextMtl, attrib.format->id, &convertedStride);
589
590 // Allocate space for startElement + elementCount so indexing will work. If we don't
591 // start at zero all the indices will be off.
592 // Only elementCount vertices will be used by the upcoming draw so that is all we copy.
593 size_t bytesToAllocate = (startElement + elementCount) * convertedStride;
594 src += startElement * binding.getStride();
595 size_t destOffset = startElement * convertedStride;
596
597 mCurrentArrayBufferFormats[attribIndex] = &streamFormat;
598 mCurrentArrayBufferStrides[attribIndex] = convertedStride;
599
600 if (bytesToAllocate <= mInlineDataMaxSize)
601 {
602 // If the data is small enough, use host memory instead of creating GPU buffer. To
603 // avoid synchronizing access to GPU buffer that is still in use.
604 angle::MemoryBuffer &convertedClientArray =
605 mConvertedClientSmallArrays[attribIndex];
606 if (bytesToAllocate > convertedClientArray.size())
607 {
608 ANGLE_CHECK_GL_ALLOC(contextMtl, convertedClientArray.resize(bytesToAllocate));
609 }
610
611 ASSERT(streamFormat.vertexLoadFunction);
612 streamFormat.vertexLoadFunction(src, binding.getStride(), elementCount,
613 convertedClientArray.data() + destOffset);
614
615 mCurrentArrayBuffers[attribIndex] = nullptr;
616 mCurrentArrayInlineDataPointers[attribIndex] = convertedClientArray.data();
617 mCurrentArrayInlineDataSizes[attribIndex] = bytesToAllocate;
618 mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets[attribIndex] = 0;
619 }
620 else
621 {
622 // Stream the client data to a GPU buffer. Synchronization might happen if buffer is
623 // in use.
624 mDynamicVertexData.updateAlignment(contextMtl,
625 streamFormat.actualAngleFormat().pixelBytes);
626 ANGLE_TRY(StreamVertexData(contextMtl, &mDynamicVertexData, src, bytesToAllocate,
627 destOffset, elementCount, binding.getStride(),
628 streamFormat.vertexLoadFunction,
629 &mConvertedArrayBufferHolders[attribIndex],
630 &mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets[attribIndex]));
631
632 mCurrentArrayBuffers[attribIndex] = &mConvertedArrayBufferHolders[attribIndex];
633 }
634 } // if (needStreaming)
635 }
636
637 mVertexArrayDirty = true;
638
639 return angle::Result::Continue;
640}
641
642angle::Result VertexArrayMtl::syncDirtyAttrib(const gl::Context *glContext,
643 const gl::VertexAttribute &attrib,
644 const gl::VertexBinding &binding,
645 size_t attribIndex)
646{
647 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
648 ASSERT(mtl::kMaxVertexAttribs > attribIndex);
649
650 if (attrib.enabled)
651 {
652 gl::Buffer *bufferGL = binding.getBuffer().get();
653 const mtl::VertexFormat &format = contextMtl->getVertexFormat(attrib.format->id, false);
654
655 if (bufferGL)
656 {
657 BufferMtl *bufferMtl = mtl::GetImpl(bufferGL);
658 bool needConversion =
659 format.actualFormatId != format.intendedFormatId ||
660 (binding.getOffset() % format.actualAngleFormat().pixelBytes) != 0 ||
661 (binding.getOffset() % 4) != 0 ||
662 (binding.getStride() < format.actualAngleFormat().pixelBytes) ||
663 (binding.getStride() % mtl::kVertexAttribBufferStrideAlignment) != 0;
664
665 if (needConversion)
666 {
667 ANGLE_TRY(convertVertexBuffer(glContext, bufferMtl, binding, attribIndex, format));
668 }
669 else
670 {
671 mCurrentArrayBuffers[attribIndex] = bufferMtl;
672 mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets[attribIndex] = binding.getOffset();
673 mCurrentArrayBufferStrides[attribIndex] = binding.getStride();
674
675 mCurrentArrayBufferFormats[attribIndex] = &format;
676 }
677 }
678 else
679 {
680 // ContextMtl must feed the client data using updateClientAttribs()
681 }
682 }
683 else
684 {
685 // Use default attribute value. Handled in setupDraw().
686 mCurrentArrayBuffers[attribIndex] = nullptr;
687 mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets[attribIndex] = 0;
688 mCurrentArrayBufferStrides[attribIndex] = 0;
689 mCurrentArrayBufferFormats[attribIndex] =
690 &contextMtl->getVertexFormat(angle::FormatID::NONE, false);
691 }
692
693 return angle::Result::Continue;
694}
695
696angle::Result VertexArrayMtl::getIndexBuffer(const gl::Context *context,
697 gl::DrawElementsType type,
698 size_t count,
699 const void *indices,
700 mtl::BufferRef *idxBufferOut,
701 size_t *idxBufferOffsetOut,
702 gl::DrawElementsType *indexTypeOut)
703{
704 const gl::Buffer *glElementArrayBuffer = getState().getElementArrayBuffer();
705
706 size_t convertedOffset = reinterpret_cast<size_t>(indices);
707 if (!glElementArrayBuffer)
708 {
709 ANGLE_TRY(streamIndexBufferFromClient(context, type, count, indices, idxBufferOut,
710 idxBufferOffsetOut));
711 }
712 else
713 {
714 bool needConversion = type == gl::DrawElementsType::UnsignedByte ||
715 (convertedOffset % mtl::kIndexBufferOffsetAlignment) != 0;
716 if (needConversion)
717 {
718 ANGLE_TRY(convertIndexBuffer(context, type, convertedOffset, idxBufferOut,
719 idxBufferOffsetOut));
720 }
721 else
722 {
723 // No conversion needed:
724 BufferMtl *bufferMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glElementArrayBuffer);
725 *idxBufferOut = bufferMtl->getCurrentBuffer();
726 *idxBufferOffsetOut = convertedOffset;
727 }
728 }
729
730 *indexTypeOut = type;
731 if (type == gl::DrawElementsType::UnsignedByte)
732 {
733 // This buffer is already converted to ushort indices above
734 *indexTypeOut = gl::DrawElementsType::UnsignedShort;
735 }
736
737 return angle::Result::Continue;
738}
739
740std::vector<DrawCommandRange> VertexArrayMtl::getDrawIndices(const gl::Context *glContext,
741 gl::DrawElementsType originalIndexType,
742 gl::DrawElementsType indexType,
743 gl::PrimitiveMode primitiveMode,
744 uint32_t indexCount,
745 size_t offset)
746{
747 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
748 std::vector<DrawCommandRange> drawCommands;
749 // The indexed draw needs to be split to separate draw commands in case primitive restart is enabled
750 // and the drawn primitive supports primitive restart. Otherwise the whole indexed draw can be sent
751 // as one draw command.
752 bool isSimpleType =
753 primitiveMode == gl::PrimitiveMode::Points ||
754 primitiveMode == gl::PrimitiveMode::Lines ||
755 primitiveMode == gl::PrimitiveMode::Triangles;
756 if (!isSimpleType || !glContext->getState().isPrimitiveRestartEnabled())
757 {
758 drawCommands.push_back({indexCount, offset});
759 return drawCommands;
760 }
761
762 BufferMtl *idxBuffer = mtl::GetImpl(getState().getElementArrayBuffer());
763 const std::vector<IndexRange> &restartIndices = idxBuffer->getRestartIndices(contextMtl, originalIndexType);
764 // Reminder, offset is in bytes, not elements.
765 // Slice draw commands based off of indices.
766 int nIndicesPerPrimitive;
767 switch (primitiveMode)
768 {
769 case gl::PrimitiveMode::Points:
770 nIndicesPerPrimitive = 1;
771 break;
772 case gl::PrimitiveMode::Lines:
773 nIndicesPerPrimitive = 2;
774 break;
775 case gl::PrimitiveMode::Triangles:
776 nIndicesPerPrimitive = 3;
777 break;
778 default:
779 UNREACHABLE();
780 return drawCommands;
781 }
782 const GLuint indexTypeBytes = gl::GetDrawElementsTypeSize(indexType);
783 uint32_t indicesLeft = indexCount;
784 size_t currentIndexOffset = offset / indexTypeBytes;
785
786 for (auto &range : restartIndices)
787 {
788 if (range.restartBegin > currentIndexOffset)
789 {
790 int64_t nIndicesInSlice = ((int64_t)range.restartBegin - currentIndexOffset) - ((int64_t) range.restartBegin - currentIndexOffset) % nIndicesPerPrimitive;
791 size_t restartSize = (range.restartEnd - range.restartBegin) + 1;
792 if (nIndicesInSlice > nIndicesPerPrimitive)
793 drawCommands.push_back({(uint32_t) nIndicesInSlice, currentIndexOffset * indexTypeBytes});
794 // Account for dropped indices due to incomplete primitives.
795 size_t indicesUsed = ( (range.restartBegin + restartSize) - currentIndexOffset);
796 if (indicesLeft <= indicesUsed)
797 {
798 indicesLeft = 0;
799 }
800 else
801 {
802 indicesLeft -= indicesUsed;
803 }
804 currentIndexOffset = (size_t)(range.restartBegin + restartSize);
805 }
806 // If the initial offset into the index buffer is within a restart zone, move to the end of the restart zone.
807 else if (range.restartEnd >= currentIndexOffset)
808 {
809 size_t restartSize = (range.restartEnd - currentIndexOffset) + 1;
810 if (indicesLeft <= restartSize)
811 {
812 indicesLeft = 0;
813 }
814 else
815 {
816 indicesLeft -= restartSize;
817 }
818 currentIndexOffset = (size_t)(currentIndexOffset + restartSize);
819 }
820 }
821 if (indicesLeft >= nIndicesPerPrimitive)
822 drawCommands.push_back({indicesLeft, currentIndexOffset * indexTypeBytes});
823 return drawCommands;
824}
825
826
827angle::Result VertexArrayMtl::convertIndexBuffer(const gl::Context *glContext,
828 gl::DrawElementsType indexType,
829 size_t offset,
830 mtl::BufferRef *idxBufferOut,
831 size_t *idxBufferOffsetOut)
832{
833 size_t offsetModulo = offset % mtl::kIndexBufferOffsetAlignment;
834 ASSERT(offsetModulo != 0 || indexType == gl::DrawElementsType::UnsignedByte);
835
836 size_t alignedOffset = offset - offsetModulo;
837 if (indexType == gl::DrawElementsType::UnsignedByte)
838 {
839 // Unsigned byte index will be promoted to unsigned short, thus double its offset.
840 alignedOffset = alignedOffset << 1;
841 }
842
843 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
844 const gl::State &glState = glContext->getState();
845 BufferMtl *idxBuffer = mtl::GetImpl(getState().getElementArrayBuffer());
846
847 IndexConversionBufferMtl *conversion = idxBuffer->getIndexConversionBuffer(
848 contextMtl, indexType, glState.isPrimitiveRestartEnabled(), offsetModulo);
849
850 // Has the content of the buffer has changed since last conversion?
851 if (!conversion->dirty)
852 {
853 // reuse the converted buffer
854 *idxBufferOut = conversion->convertedBuffer;
855 *idxBufferOffsetOut = conversion->convertedOffset + alignedOffset;
856 return angle::Result::Continue;
857 }
858
859 size_t indexCount = GetIndexCount(idxBuffer, offsetModulo, indexType);
860 if ((!contextMtl->getDisplay()->getFeatures().breakRenderPassIsCheap.enabled &&
861 contextMtl->getRenderCommandEncoder()))
862 {
863 // We shouldn't use GPU to convert when we are in a middle of a render pass.
864 ANGLE_TRY(StreamIndexData(contextMtl, &conversion->data,
865 idxBuffer->getClientShadowCopyData(contextMtl) + offsetModulo,
866 indexType, indexCount, glState.isPrimitiveRestartEnabled(),
867 &conversion->convertedBuffer, &conversion->convertedOffset));
868 }
869 else
870 {
871 ANGLE_TRY(convertIndexBufferGPU(glContext, indexType, idxBuffer, offsetModulo, indexCount,
872 conversion));
873 }
874 //Calculate ranges for prim restart simple types.
875 *idxBufferOut = conversion->convertedBuffer;
876 *idxBufferOffsetOut = conversion->convertedOffset + alignedOffset;
877
878 return angle::Result::Continue;
879}
880
881angle::Result VertexArrayMtl::convertIndexBufferGPU(const gl::Context *glContext,
882 gl::DrawElementsType indexType,
883 BufferMtl *idxBuffer,
884 size_t offset,
885 size_t indexCount,
886 IndexConversionBufferMtl *conversion)
887{
888 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
889 DisplayMtl *display = contextMtl->getDisplay();
890
891 const size_t amount = GetIndexConvertedBufferSize(indexType, indexCount);
892
893 // Allocate new buffer, save it in conversion struct so that we can reuse it when the content
894 // of the original buffer is not dirty.
895 conversion->data.releaseInFlightBuffers(contextMtl);
896 ANGLE_TRY(conversion->data.allocate(contextMtl, amount, nullptr, &conversion->convertedBuffer,
897 &conversion->convertedOffset));
898
899 // Do the conversion on GPU.
900 ANGLE_TRY(display->getUtils().convertIndexBufferGPU(
901 contextMtl, {indexType, static_cast<uint32_t>(indexCount), idxBuffer->getCurrentBuffer(),
902 static_cast<uint32_t>(offset), conversion->convertedBuffer,
903 static_cast<uint32_t>(conversion->convertedOffset),
904 glContext->getState().isPrimitiveRestartEnabled()}));
905
906 ANGLE_TRY(conversion->data.commit(contextMtl));
907
908 ASSERT(conversion->dirty);
909 conversion->dirty = false;
910
911 return angle::Result::Continue;
912}
913
914angle::Result VertexArrayMtl::streamIndexBufferFromClient(const gl::Context *context,
915 gl::DrawElementsType indexType,
916 size_t indexCount,
917 const void *sourcePointer,
918 mtl::BufferRef *idxBufferOut,
919 size_t *idxBufferOffsetOut)
920{
921 ASSERT(getState().getElementArrayBuffer() == nullptr);
922 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
923
924 auto srcData = static_cast<const uint8_t *>(sourcePointer);
925 ANGLE_TRY(StreamIndexData(contextMtl, &mDynamicIndexData, srcData, indexType, indexCount,
926 context->getState().isPrimitiveRestartEnabled(), idxBufferOut,
927 idxBufferOffsetOut));
928
929 return angle::Result::Continue;
930}
931
932angle::Result VertexArrayMtl::convertVertexBuffer(const gl::Context *glContext,
933 BufferMtl *srcBuffer,
934 const gl::VertexBinding &binding,
935 size_t attribIndex,
936 const mtl::VertexFormat &srcVertexFormat)
937{
938 unsigned srcFormatSize = srcVertexFormat.intendedAngleFormat().pixelBytes;
939
940 size_t numVertices = GetVertexCount(srcBuffer, binding, srcFormatSize);
941 if (numVertices == 0)
942 {
943 // Out of bound buffer access, can return any values.
944 // See KHR_robust_buffer_access_behavior
945 mCurrentArrayBuffers[attribIndex] = srcBuffer;
946 mCurrentArrayBufferFormats[attribIndex] = &srcVertexFormat;
947 mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets[attribIndex] = 0;
948 mCurrentArrayBufferStrides[attribIndex] = 16;
949 return angle::Result::Continue;
950 }
951
952 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
953
954 // Convert to tightly packed format
955 GLuint stride;
956 const mtl::VertexFormat &convertedFormat =
957 GetVertexConversionFormat(contextMtl, srcVertexFormat.intendedFormatId, &stride);
958
959 ConversionBufferMtl *conversion = srcBuffer->getVertexConversionBuffer(
960 contextMtl, srcVertexFormat.intendedFormatId, binding.getStride(), binding.getOffset());
961
962 // Has the content of the buffer has changed since last conversion?
963 if (!conversion->dirty)
964 {
965 mConvertedArrayBufferHolders[attribIndex].set(conversion->convertedBuffer);
966 mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets[attribIndex] = conversion->convertedOffset;
967
968 mCurrentArrayBuffers[attribIndex] = &mConvertedArrayBufferHolders[attribIndex];
969 mCurrentArrayBufferFormats[attribIndex] = &convertedFormat;
970 mCurrentArrayBufferStrides[attribIndex] = stride;
971 return angle::Result::Continue;
972 }
973
974 const angle::Format &convertedAngleFormat = convertedFormat.actualAngleFormat();
975 bool canConvertToFloatOnGPU =
976 convertedAngleFormat.isFloat() && !convertedAngleFormat.isVertexTypeHalfFloat();
977
978 bool canExpandComponentsOnGPU = convertedFormat.actualSameGLType;
979
980 if (contextMtl->getRenderCommandEncoder() &&
981 !contextMtl->getDisplay()->getFeatures().breakRenderPassIsCheap.enabled &&
982 !contextMtl->getDisplay()->getFeatures().hasExplicitMemBarrier.enabled)
983 {
984 // Cannot use GPU to convert when we are in a middle of a render pass.
985 canConvertToFloatOnGPU = canExpandComponentsOnGPU = false;
986 }
987
988 conversion->data.releaseInFlightBuffers(contextMtl);
989 conversion->data.updateAlignment(contextMtl, convertedAngleFormat.pixelBytes);
990
991 if (canConvertToFloatOnGPU || canExpandComponentsOnGPU)
992 {
993 ANGLE_TRY(convertVertexBufferGPU(glContext, srcBuffer, binding, attribIndex,
994 convertedFormat, stride, numVertices,
995 canExpandComponentsOnGPU, conversion));
996 }
997 else
998 {
999 ANGLE_TRY(convertVertexBufferCPU(contextMtl, srcBuffer, binding, attribIndex,
1000 convertedFormat, stride, numVertices, conversion));
1001 }
1002
1003 mCurrentArrayBuffers[attribIndex] = &mConvertedArrayBufferHolders[attribIndex];
1004 mCurrentArrayBufferFormats[attribIndex] = &convertedFormat;
1005 mCurrentArrayBufferStrides[attribIndex] = stride;
1006
1007 // Cache the last converted results to be re-used later if the buffer's content won't ever be
1008 // changed.
1009 conversion->convertedBuffer = mConvertedArrayBufferHolders[attribIndex].getCurrentBuffer();
1010 conversion->convertedOffset = mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets[attribIndex];
1011
1012 ASSERT(conversion->dirty);
1013 conversion->dirty = false;
1014
1015#ifndef NDEBUG
1016 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
1017 {
1018 mConvertedArrayBufferHolders[attribIndex].getCurrentBuffer()->get().label =
1019 [NSString stringWithFormat:@"Converted from %p offset=%zu stride=%u", srcBuffer,
1020 binding.getOffset(), binding.getStride()];
1021 }
1022#endif
1023
1024 return angle::Result::Continue;
1025}
1026
1027angle::Result VertexArrayMtl::convertVertexBufferCPU(ContextMtl *contextMtl,
1028 BufferMtl *srcBuffer,
1029 const gl::VertexBinding &binding,
1030 size_t attribIndex,
1031 const mtl::VertexFormat &convertedFormat,
1032 GLuint targetStride,
1033 size_t numVertices,
1034 ConversionBufferMtl *conversion)
1035{
1036
1037 const uint8_t *srcBytes = srcBuffer->getClientShadowCopyData(contextMtl);
1038 ANGLE_CHECK_GL_ALLOC(contextMtl, srcBytes);
1039
1040 srcBytes += binding.getOffset();
1041
1042 ANGLE_TRY(StreamVertexData(
1043 contextMtl, &conversion->data, srcBytes, numVertices * targetStride, 0, numVertices,
1044 binding.getStride(), convertedFormat.vertexLoadFunction,
1045 &mConvertedArrayBufferHolders[attribIndex], &mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets[attribIndex]));
1046
1047 return angle::Result::Continue;
1048}
1049
1050angle::Result VertexArrayMtl::convertVertexBufferGPU(const gl::Context *glContext,
1051 BufferMtl *srcBuffer,
1052 const gl::VertexBinding &binding,
1053 size_t attribIndex,
1054 const mtl::VertexFormat &convertedFormat,
1055 GLuint targetStride,
1056 size_t numVertices,
1057 bool isExpandingComponents,
1058 ConversionBufferMtl *conversion)
1059{
1060 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
1061
1062 mtl::BufferRef newBuffer;
1063 size_t newBufferOffset;
1064 ANGLE_TRY(conversion->data.allocate(contextMtl, numVertices * targetStride, nullptr, &newBuffer,
1065 &newBufferOffset));
1066
1067 ANGLE_CHECK_GL_MATH(contextMtl, binding.getOffset() <= std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max());
1068 ANGLE_CHECK_GL_MATH(contextMtl, newBufferOffset <= std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max());
1069 ANGLE_CHECK_GL_MATH(contextMtl, numVertices <= std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max());
1070
1071 mtl::VertexFormatConvertParams params;
1072
1073 params.srcBuffer = srcBuffer->getCurrentBuffer();
1074 params.srcBufferStartOffset = static_cast<uint32_t>(binding.getOffset());
1075 params.srcStride = binding.getStride();
1076 params.srcDefaultAlphaData = convertedFormat.defaultAlpha;
1077
1078 params.dstBuffer = newBuffer;
1079 params.dstBufferStartOffset = static_cast<uint32_t>(newBufferOffset);
1080 params.dstStride = targetStride;
1081 params.dstComponents = convertedFormat.actualAngleFormat().channelCount;
1082
1083 params.vertexCount = static_cast<uint32_t>(numVertices);
1084
1085 mtl::RenderUtils &utils = contextMtl->getDisplay()->getUtils();
1086 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *renderEncoder = contextMtl->getRenderCommandEncoder();
1087 if (renderEncoder && contextMtl->getDisplay()->getFeatures().hasExplicitMemBarrier.enabled)
1088 {
1089 // If we are in the middle of a render pass, use vertex shader based buffer conversion to
1090 // avoid breaking the render pass.
1091 if (!isExpandingComponents)
1092 {
1093 ANGLE_TRY(utils.convertVertexFormatToFloatVS(
1094 glContext, renderEncoder, convertedFormat.intendedAngleFormat(), params));
1095 }
1096 else
1097 {
1098 ANGLE_TRY(utils.expandVertexFormatComponentsVS(
1099 glContext, renderEncoder, convertedFormat.intendedAngleFormat(), params));
1100 }
1101 }
1102 else
1103 {
1104 // Compute based buffer conversion.
1105 if (!isExpandingComponents)
1106 {
1107 ANGLE_TRY(utils.convertVertexFormatToFloatCS(
1108 contextMtl, convertedFormat.intendedAngleFormat(), params));
1109 }
1110 else
1111 {
1112 ANGLE_TRY(utils.expandVertexFormatComponentsCS(
1113 contextMtl, convertedFormat.intendedAngleFormat(), params));
1114 }
1115 }
1116
1117 ANGLE_TRY(conversion->data.commit(contextMtl));
1118
1119 mConvertedArrayBufferHolders[attribIndex].set(newBuffer);
1120 mCurrentArrayBufferOffsets[attribIndex] = newBufferOffset;
1121
1122 return angle::Result::Continue;
1123}
1124}
